actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the export of petroleum and petroleum products from the United States during the present energy crisis.

summary.text: Prohibits export of crude oil, except for refinement and reshipment back to the United States, and of oil and oil products.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the export of petroleum and petroleum products from the United States during the present energy crisis.
